method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Paragraph.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Paragraph with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Paragraphs within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Paragraph, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Paragraph, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Paragraph, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Paragraph, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Paragraph in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Paragraph in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Paragraph in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Paragraph with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Paragraph that follows the desired Paragraph.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Paragraph whose index follows the specified Paragraph in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Paragraph whose index comes before the desired Paragraph.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Paragraph in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Paragraph in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Paragraph.
Returns the Paragraph with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
